title: Sex with a Ghost? It's My Prerogative...
itunes:title: Sex with a Ghost? It's My Prerogative...
description:
WED 6/8 - The Breakfast Club discusses Bobby Brown's confession of having sex with a ghost and open up the phone lines for "Freaky Encounters of the Third Kind". Then the Donkey of the Day goes to an Adult Breastfeeding couple...because we had to get back to normal topics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
